name: CloudFormationDeleteChangeSet
description: Deletes an AWS CloudFormation change set.
author: Amazon Web Services

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWSCredentials'

inputs.name: changeSetName
inputs.label: Change Set Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the change set that you want to delete.

inputs.name: stackName
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you specified the name of a change set to delete, specify the stack name or ID (ARN) that is associated with it.

messages.DeletingChangeSet: Deleting change set %s, associated with stack %s
messages.DeleteChangeSetFailed: Request to delete change set failed with error: %s
